story.text: The Math plugin renders LaTeX mathematical notation embedded within an otherwise normal paragraph.

Probability of getting \(k\) heads when flipping \(n\) coins
\[ P(E) = {n \choose k} p^k (1-p)^{ n-k } \]
This plugin replaces the older MathJax plugin, using KaTeX as the rendering engine. Read about the KaTeX display engine at [https://katex.org katex.org].

Enclose LaTeX within **backslashed parens** `\(     \)` when you want to embed an expression fragment within running text.
Enclose LaTeX within **backslashed square brackets** `\[     \]` when you want to write complete expressions on lines by themselves.

\[ P(E) = {n \choose k} p^k (1-p)^{ n-k } \]
This plugin replaces the older MathJax plugin, using KaTeX as the rendering engine. Read about the KaTeX display engine at [https://katex.org katex.org].

Enclose LaTeX within **backslashed square brackets** `\[     \]` when you want to write complete expressions on lines by themselves.
